alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued September 02 at 8:41PM MDT until September 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT SATURDAY NIGHT FOR FLATHEAD LAKE... * WHAT...A very strong cold front will bring a sudden and dangerous wind shift that will produce waves 2 to 4 feet and west winds 20 to 40 mph with gusts to 50 mph on Flathead Lake. After the frontal passage, winds will diminish below advisory levels by midnight, but continue to stay breezy through Sunday. * WHERE...Flathead Lake. * WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to midnight MDT Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves will create hazardous conditions for small craft. Showers and thunderstorms along the front will exacerbate wind speeds, potentially gusting over 50 mph.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
